The Digital Self



What I do online each day is me.



The data I produce each day online is me.



I am not for sale to the highest bidder.



Photos of me online are me.



Videos of me online are me.



My location in this moment is me.



Where I am going is me.



Where I came from was me.



What I watch online is me.



What I read on and offline is me.



What music and podcasts I listen to is me.



What I purchase online is me.



The events I attend are me.



Where I stay in hotels is me.



My relationships with friends and family is me.



I regularly cleanup my online information.



I am always skeptical of new applications.



I make sure my applications bring me joy.



I regularly get offline and read a book.



I always tke the time to go for a walk.



I value doing things that are not on the computer.



I matter.

On and Offline.
